mv A S.A
mv C S.C
mv S s.go
-- x.go --
package m

var S struct{}
var A int
var C int
-- q/q.go --
package q

import "m"

var _ = m.A
-- stdout --
diff old/s.go new/s.go
--- old/s.go
+++ new/s.go
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+package m
+
+var S struct {
+	A int
+	C int
+}
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -1,5 +1 @@
 package m
-
-var S struct{}
-var A int
-var C int
diff old/q/q.go new/q/q.go
--- old/q/q.go
+++ new/q/q.go
@@ -2,4 +2,4 @@

 import "m"

-var _ = m.A
+var _ = m.S.A
